DOC.brief_summary: The purpose prospective single-center study evaluate laboratory outcome random start ovarian stimulation oocytes donor . The study perform egg-donors type treatment potential implement general infertility population .
DOC.detailed_description: The study group start ovarian stimulation randomly different moment throughout menstrual cycle . Randomization take place day 2-3 menstrual cycle , accord list random allocation treatment egg-donors assigned random start ovarian stimulation : During follicular phase start day 5,7,9,11 13 menstrual cycle luteal phase start LH peak +3 , +5 , +7 , +9 +11 . Egg-donors receive urinary FSH 150-225 IU/d antagonist protocol cetrorelix acetate 0,25 mg/d start five day ovarian stimulation + GnRH agonist trigger triptorelin 0,2 mg final follicular maturation . Foliculometry transvaginal ultrasound serum analysis ( estradiol , progesterone , LH FSH ) include cycle monitoring .
DOC.criteria: Premenopausal woman 1835 year old FSH level < 10 mIU/ml AFC > 10 Regular cycle BMI < 28 Signed inform consent PCOS patient Allergy gonadotrophin Concomitant participation trial
